description.ko: 생명의 고동과 무중력 상태에서 실크처럼 부드러운 움직임을 모방한 유동적인 형태를 통해 자연스러운 리듬을 매혹적으로 탐구합니다.
description.en: A captivating exploration of natural rhythm, featuring fluid shapes that mimic the pulse of life and the graceful movement of silken elements in a weightless environment.

prompt: Cinematic macro shot of fluid, organic ribbons weaving through a luminous void, translucent silk textures, soft iridescent glow, rhythmic waves, bioluminescent particles, soft pastel gradients, liquid motion, high detail, 8k resolution, ethereal and calming atmosphere.
